title: Purchasing RPS Not received
body:
EvilBartXD
I have purchased RP for 10 AUD just now, I have received 1000RPs But I did not get thet extra 1000RPs that was showed in the store. Riots please help me, Fix this and give me the RPs I bought.

replies.body: So unless I'm missing some special offer, $10 gets you 920RP + bonus 80RP to equal 1000RP all up.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=pGJmBWOw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-05T11:36:19.718+0000)
>
> So unless I'm missing some special offer, $10 gets you 920RP + bonus 80RP to equal 1000RP all up.

Wait i thought the 920 + 80 RP was the whole bonus. Are you saying that I'm purchasing 920RP with (80 RP bonus)?
I thought it was 1k plus the 920+80RP bonus. If so I'm either really dumb if IM the only one thinking that

920 is the amount you are buying and 80 is the bonus you get for buying 'in bulk'.

It's 920 (+80 Bonus) not a bonus of 920+80.

The RP to $ ratio has dropped relatively recently to account for the new taxes on digital goods applied by the AUS and NZ (and many other countries) governments.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=pGJmBWOw,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-07-05T12:15:42.332+0000)
>
> 920 is the amount you are buying and 80 is the bonus you get for buying 'in bulk'.
> 
> It's 920 (+80 Bonus) not a bonus of 920+80.
> 
> The RP to $ ratio has dropped relatively recently to account for the new taxes on digital goods applied by the AUS and NZ (and many other countries) governments.

I thought so now, thanks for the clarification
